reviewText: This was a test for me to see if I would be able to get into hentai. The art is very well done but the story and sex scenes left much to be desired. For those thinking that this would be a great hentai, be advised that there is a lot of BDSM and torture going on to a point where it becomes a major turnoff. Its not the kinky variety this is some really nasty torture, for instance one of the male school goers is beaten to a pulp and then pushed to the ground where the female leader of the group sits on his face and uses sticks to "pleasure" the poor sap while the three bullies that beat him are holding him down so he can't get free. The other male lead is turning teachers into his slave by chaining them and raping them see where this is going. I thought this was going to be mild but by the end of disc one I realized that this was a waste of money. Never again.
